A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie completely ruined the star wars feel and should be G-rated\, as anyone over the age of 9 can see that there are a lot of holes in the plot\, horrible emotional toning with simultaneously attempting humor while attempting serious emotion. This was not fun to watch\, and despite the incredible CG\, it just can't make up for the character flaws\, plot inconsistencies\, and forced political messages written by Rian Johnson. I hated this moive.
